name: Music_3302.wav
keywords: ['middle eastern song', 'flute', 'oud', 'qanun', 'percussion', 'tambourine', 'song for belly dance', 'male voice', 'moderate tempo']
caption: This middle-eastern song features a male voice singing the main melody. An oud plays the same melody as the voice. This is accompanied by middle-eastern percussion instruments played with the hands. A tambourine is played to accent the percussion beats. After the voice, the main melody is played on a flute. This is accompanied by a qanun. This song can be played for a belly dance programme.
